pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Resoto ðŸ’œ ScarfScarf Collector Plugin for ResotoThis collector plugin is used to collect data from Scarf. It is used internally at Some Engineering to create metrics about image downloads.To export the number of image pulls add the following config to `resoto.metrics````resotometrics: [...] metrics: scarf_downloads_total: # Metric help text help: 'Scarf downloads' # Aggregation search to run search: 'aggregate(/ancestors.cloud.reported.name as cloud, /ancestors.account.reported.name as organization, name as repository: sum(pull_count) as scarf_downloads_total): is(scarf_package)' # Type of metric (gauge or counter) type: 'counter'```
